short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small utility to encode/decode strings and files to base64 representations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small utility to encode/decode strings and files to base64 representations.

What's new
---------
- speed boost for text box's when dealing with large amounts of text by disabling autocomplete and other unnecessary functions for base64 strings
- added the ability to drag and drop files for encoding
- added offline support
- minor tweaks
